metadata.title: CVE-2022-30952 Jenkins plugin: User-scoped credentials exposed to other users by Pipeline SCM API for Blue Ocean Plugin (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: The MITRE CVE dictionary describes this issue as: Jenkins Pipeline SCM API for Blue Ocean Plugin 1.25.3 and earlier allows attackers with Job/Configure permission to access credentials with attacker-specified IDs stored in the private per-user credentials stores of any attacker-specified user in Jenkins.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
jenkins-2-plugins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
